issue.title: [CF 644] Condition Resources: Percent Rage
issue.body:
Warriors got a new glyph that allows the ragebar to extend to 120 rage. Because of that I believe it would be best for the condition Percent Rage to accept an absolute value instead of a percentage and it should accept numbers up to 120.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #644 | Raw

comments.body:
Just the existing absolute rage and max rage condition would need to be changed. The percentage still can't go above 100%.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Also, note to self - check if the focus and the energy conditions allow for their real maximum with talents/glyphs. Not sure if I ever accommodated for those, but I seem to vaguely remember having done so.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Wait a minute... all the absolute and max resource conditions have no min/max values. You should be able to adjust the slider for these up to 120. You just have to take it up to 100 first, and then the slider will adjust itself (unless I am remembering incorrectly how I coded the variable range sliders.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Nevermind, I typed out this ticket without using my brain. There already is an absolute rage condition. Really self? Really?


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer
